microCredit.title: Micro-loan

consumer.title: Consumer Credit
consumer.description: Finance your personal projects with transparency. Car, renovations, equipment... We always tell you why, accepted or declined.

professional.title: Business Credit
professional.tagline: Quick cash flow for freelancers and small businesses

student.title: Student Loan
student.tagline: Finance your studies without a bank guarantor

student.ideal: Ideal for: tuition fees, housing, equipment, mobility

salaryAdvance.title: Salary Advance

leasing.title: Leasing
leasing.description: Vehicle, professional equipment... Leasing allows you to spread the cost without heavy investment. The asset serves as collateral, hence better rates.
leasing.ideal: Ideal for: vehicle, professional equipment, IT hardware

loanConsolidation.title: Loan Consolidation
loanConsolidation.description: Multiple loans? We consolidate them into one with often reduced monthly payment. Take back control of your budget.
